flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: How to make a car out of two Ps2 controlers
guide.introduction_rendered:
How to make a car out of two Ps2 controlers

Relevant parts
  • Hobby box two 9v battery clips and a togle switch and don't forget some little wheels
Tools
  • screwsdriver ,soldering gun, mostly whatever you want to use to get inside to controler

parts.text: Hobby box two 9v battery clips and a togle switch and don't forget some little wheels

lines.text: Dont break the controler you need the insides
lines.text_raw: Dont break the controler you need the insides

lines.text: open the controler and you will see to little mottors at the bottom
lines.text_raw: open the controler and you will see to little mottors at the bottom
